posts.post_content:
Looking for nice Goodwin Champions cards (both baseball and other) graded by SGC. Please email me with what you have available.

Thanks---Jay

I have the following available. Let me know which interest you and I can send scans. Most of the cards present much better with reverse paper loss. Thanks
Buffalo Bill SGC 1
Jem Smith SGC 1
Schaefer SGC 3
Wood SGC 2
Mitchell Raw GD-VG
Beckmann SGC 1
Muldoon SGC 1.5
Page SGC 1
Prince SGC 1
Ross, Slosson, Daly and Zukertort All Raw PR-VG

Chris--Thanks for the prompt reply. I am looking for higher grade cards--minimum SCG60.

Thanks---Jay
